content.raw:
I finally looked through the test that you added; it's really nice! I just have some minor suggestions for it (in d3c9e84e408d):

* I added a few debug messages in the loops, so that any failed expectations can be associated with a specific model
* I also added some checks to the Depth test to verify that contacts were checked for each model
content.html:
I finally looked through the test that you added; it's really nice! I just have some minor suggestions for it (in d3c9e84e408d):
